statements: SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists;
SELECT id, email_address FROM email_marketing_lists;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE preferences->>'frequency' = 'daily';
SELECT id, customer_id, email_address FROM email_marketing_lists ORDER BY email_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, email_address FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT id, preferences FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE customer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY email_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM email_marketing_lists GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, preference1 FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT id, email, preference2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference1 = 'Sports';
SELECT * FROM marketing_lists WHERE list_name = 'Promotions';
SELECT list_id, list_name, target_criteria FROM marketing_lists ORDER BY list_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference1 = 'value1' AND preference2 = 'value2';
SELECT id, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_lists WHERE target_criteria LIKE '%target%' ORDER BY list_id ASC;
SELECT list_name, list_description FROM marketing_lists WHERE list_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, email, preference1, preference2 FROM customer_preferences INNER JOIN marketing_lists ON customer_preferences.id = marketing_lists.list_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT list_name FROM campaign_lists WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT list_name FROM campaign_lists WHERE list_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM campaign_lists ORDER BY list_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM preferences WHERE preference_1 = TRUE;
SELECT list_name, campaign_name, start_date FROM targeted_lists JOIN campaigns ON targeted_lists.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent, total_opened, total_clicked FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_results ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_type, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email';
SELECT list_name, campaign_name FROM targeted_lists INNER JOIN campaigns ON targeted_lists.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sent, total_clicked FROM campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_results ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id WHERE total_clicked > 100;
SELECT preference_1, preference_2 FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM preferences;
SELECT id, email, subscription_status FROM preferences ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM preferences WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT id, email FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM preferences WHERE subscription_status = TRUE ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM email_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, recipient_email FROM campaign_results WHERE click_rate > 10 AND conversion_rate < 5 ORDER BY campaign_id, conversion_rate DESC;
